# The Cunningham Sisters Productions

> Independent film production company creating "Resilience" - a non-profit drama exposing systemic abuse in unregulated teen residential treatment programs.

## About

The Cunningham Sisters Productions is a film production company founded by Kenna and Madi Grace Cunningham. Our mission is creating advocacy films that expose injustice and drive systemic change.

We are a 501(c)(3) non-profit through The Film Institute. All donations are tax-deductible and split 50/50 between advocacy for regulation of the troubled teen industry and funding future advocacy films.

## Current Project: Resilience

**Resilience** is a gritty drama exposing systemic abuse in unregulated teen residential treatment programs. Inspired by real events, the film follows young people trapped in an industry that operates in shadows.

- **Status**: Post-Production (wrapped April 2025)
- **Genre**: Drama / Social Issue
- **Director**: Kenna Cunningham (credits: Netflix, Apple TV, Amazon Prime, Nat Geo)
- **Writer**: Madi Grace Cunningham (LAMDA trained, Amazon/Sony/Capitol Records)
- **Producers**: David Cunningham, Mike Leahy
- **Advisors**: Janet & Lee Batchler (Batman Forever writers, USC professors)

### Funding Progress
- **Goal**: $150,000
- **Current**: $89,111 (59% funded)
- **GoFundMe**: https://gofund.me/d00b98309

## Key Pages

- **Home** (https://cunninghamsistersproductions.com/): Main landing page with film information, proof of concept video, team profiles, and donation options
- **The Plan** (https://cunninghamsistersproductions.com/the-plan.html): Detailed production timeline, budget breakdown, and funding information
- **Contact** (https://cunninghamsistersproductions.com/contact.html): How to reach the team for press, partnerships, and inquiries
- **Media Kit** (https://cunninghamsistersproductions.com/media-kit.html): Press resources, downloadable assets, and social media toolkit

## The Team

### Kenna Cunningham - Director/Producer
Award-winning director with credits on Netflix, Apple TV, Amazon Prime, and National Geographic. Brings visual storytelling expertise to expose difficult truths.

### Madi Grace Cunningham - Writer/Actor/Producer
LAMDA-trained performer with Amazon, Sony, and Capitol Records credits. Personal connection to the troubled teen industry drives the authentic storytelling.

### David Cunningham - Producer
20+ years at Fox, Disney, and ABC. Founder of Global Virtual Studios. Brings major studio experience to independent advocacy filmmaking.

### Mike Leahy - Producer
Co-founder of NEO Art & Logic with 30+ feature films. Expertise in bringing complex stories to screen.

### Janet & Lee Batchler - Advisors
Batman Forever screenwriters and USC professors. Provide story consulting and industry guidance.

## Contact

- **Email**: filmresilience@gmail.com
- **Instagram**: @thecunninghamsisters
- **Website**: https://cunninghamsistersproductions.com/

## How to Help

1. **Donate**: Tax-deductible contributions via GoFundMe (https://gofund.me/d00b98309)
2. **Share**: Spread awareness about the film and the troubled teen industry
3. **Connect**: Reach out for press inquiries, partnerships, or collaboration
